# Sriniketh J. Portfolio

> Personal portfolio website for Sriniketh J. - Software Engineer specializing in ML, Networking, and Full Stack Development.

## Overview

A Next.js 15 portfolio with a terminal/CLI aesthetic theme featuring dark/light modes, a searchable blog system with 50+ articles, project showcase, and EmailJS contact form.

## Tech Stack

- Next.js 15 (App Router)
- TypeScript
- Tailwind CSS v4
- shadcn/ui components
- Lucide React icons
- EmailJS for contact form

## Pages

- `/` - Home with typewriter effect
- `/projects` - Project showcase grid
- `/blogs` - Searchable blog listing with publication filters
- `/about` - Bio, skills, and experience timeline
- `/contact` - Contact form with EmailJS

## Key Features

- Command palette (Ctrl/Cmd+K) with FZF-style interface
- Dark/Light mode with localStorage persistence
- Mobile responsive design
- Terminal-inspired UI (`$ whoami`, `$ cat blogs/`)
- Red-only accent color scheme

## Design

Colors:
- Background: #eeeeee (light) / #000000 (dark)
- Primary/Accent: #d84040 (light) / #ff6b6b (dark)
- Text: #1a1a1a (light) / #f5f5f5 (dark)

Typography:
- Headings: JetBrains Mono (monospace)
- Body: System sans-serif
